alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued January 24 at 1:32AM PST until January 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY BELOW 1500 FEET... * WHAT...A period of stagnant air with light winds. * WHERE...In Washington, South Washington Cascade Foothills, Central Columbia River Gorge and Willapa Hills. In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon, Central Columbia River Gorge, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills, Central Coast Range of Western Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Air stagnation could result in the development and persistence of poor air quality.
info.instruction: People with respiratory illness should follow their physician`s advice for dealing with high levels of air pollution during periods of stagnant air. State air quality agencies highly recommend that no outdoor burning occur and that residential wood burning devices be limited as much as possible. According to state air quality agencies, prolonged periods of stagnant air can hold pollutants close to the ground where people live and breathe. Check with your local burn agency for any current restrictions in your area.

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills
